name: CLKComplicationTemplate
desc: An abstract class that defines the base behavior for all templates.

items.name: var tintColor: UIColor?
items.desc: The tint color to apply to elements of the template.

items.name: func previewContext(faceColor: CLKComplicationTemplate.PreviewFaceColor) -> View
items.desc: Returns a view that Xcode can display as a preview.

items.name: struct CLKComplicationTemplate.PreviewFaceColor
items.desc: The valid face colors for complication templates.

items.name: enum CLKComplicationColumnAlignment
items.desc: Constants indicating the alignment of text in columns.

items.name: enum CLKComplicationRingStyle
items.desc: Constants indicating the appearance of a progress ring.
